pr_title: Add basic typing for language and extensions

timeline.message: Add basic typing for language and extensions

timeline.bodyText: Was this broken before? ext wasn't a variable defined in this scope :O
timeline.author: mschwager
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -106,11 +117,13 @@ def _parse_output(output: str, curr_dir: Path) -> Set[Path]:
                 )
             return files
 
-        def _find_files_with_extention(curr_dir: Path, extension: str) -> Set[Path]:
+        def _find_files_with_extention(
+            curr_dir: Path, extension: FileExtension
+        ) -> Set[Path]:
             """
                 Return set of all files in curr_dir with given extension
             """
-            return set(p for p in curr_dir.rglob(f"*.{ext}") if p.is_file())

replies.bodyText: It wasn't broken :O the for loop this function was called in defined an ext
replies.author: brendongo
